Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.GameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable
    public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Is the center of the game, which embeds most of the game rules. It is updated by the controller by quite general methods that represents events of the game, then it knows how to transform these calls in actual modifications on data. It is not aware of concepts like network and timers, but it does make distinction between two possible players' states: active and inactive.

      • GameModel

        public GameModel()
        Builds the gameModel, initializing all its attributes to default values

      • GameModel

        public GameModel​(int layoutConfig,
                 int skullsNumber)
        builds the game model. set attributes to default values and layoutConfig and skullsConfig to chosen values
        Parameters:
        layoutConfig - number config of layout [-1, 3]
        skullsNumber - number of skulls [5,8]

    • Method Detail

      • getMatch

        public Match getMatch()
        Gets the current match in progress
        Returns:
        the actual reference to match

      • isMatchInProgress

        public boolean isMatchInProgress()
        Tells if the match is in progress
        Returns:
        true if the match is in progress

      • addPlayer

        public Player addPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
                 throws NameAlreadyTakenException,
                        GameFullException,
                        NameNotFoundException,
                        AlreadyLoggedException,
                        NameEmptyException
        Adds a player of the given name to the game. It creates a new one if the match is not in progress, otherwise it retrieves the xorresponding Player
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player (either new or returning)
        Returns:
        the Player object corresponding to the name
        Throws:
        NameAlreadyTakenException - if the name is already taken from another player
        GameFullException - if the game is already full, and no other player can join
        NameNotFoundException - if a match is in progress, but the name is not present
        AlreadyLoggedException - if a match is in progress and the corresponding players is already logged
        NameEmptyException - if name is empty

      • startMatch

        public boolean startMatch()
        Starts a match. If there is a valid backup with the same players, this is resumed, otherwise it creates a new one.
        Returns:
        true if a new match begins, false if a saved one is restored

      • startNewMatch

        public void startNewMatch()
        Force to start a new match, even if a valid backup is present

      • resumeMatchFromFile

        public void resumeMatchFromFile​(java.io.InputStream url)
        Resume a saved match from the URL of a backup file. Used to easily set up a match for tests.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the saved match

      • prepareForSpawning

        private void prepareForSpawning​(Player p,
                                boolean firstSpawn)
        Prepare a player for spawning (or respawning) by drawing one or two powerups anf making them selectable
        Parameters:
        p - the player to spawn
        firstSpawn - true if is first spawn

      • spawn

        public void spawn​(Player p,
                  PowerUp po)
        Spawns a player on the spawnPoint of the color corresponding to the powerUp (and discards it)
        Parameters:
        p - the player to spawn
        po - the powerUp corresponding to the spawnPoint

      • beginNextTurn

        private void beginNextTurn()
        Checks if the next player is born. If this is the case, it starts the nest turn, otherwise prepares it for spawning

      • nextActivePlayer

        public Player nextActivePlayer​(Player currP)
                        throws GameOverException
        Returns the next active player. The call with null player is used to get the first player (beginning of the match), otherwise currP must be contained in activePlayers
        Parameters:
        currP - If not null, must be contained in activePlayers
        Returns:
        Next active player
        Throws:
        GameOverException - if game is over

      • performAction

        public void performAction​(Player p,
                          Action a)
        Performs an action for a player. Performing means that starts the action and sets up the possible selections necessary to the prosecution of the action.
        Parameters:
        p - player that is taking the action
        a - the action to start

      • grabThere

        public void grabThere​(Player p,
                      Square s)
        Makes a player grab in a square. If it is a spawnSquare, it sets up the choice of the weapon to grab.
        Parameters:
        p - player which is grabbing
        s - square where to grab

      • shootTarget

        public void shootTarget​(Player p,
                        Player targetP,
                        Square targetS)
        Shoot to the selected target during a shoot. Either targetP or targetS is null.
        Parameters:
        p - the player which is shooting
        targetP - the target which is receiving the shoot
        targetS - the square which is receiving the shoot

      • setupForPaying

        private void setupForPaying​(Player p)
        Checks if the player can complete the payment with what he has already paid (with powerups) and prepare selectables. If a payment can be completed OK is selectable, otherwise he can choose only powerUps. Total affordability (including powerUps) is a precondition.
        Parameters:
        p - the player who is paying

      • payWith

        public void payWith​(Player p,
                    PowerUp po)
        Adds the color of the powerUp to the credit of the player
        Parameters:
        p - the player who is paying
        po - the powerUp to discard for paying

      • completePayment

        Parameters:
        p - the player which is paying

        w - the weapon to reload

      • dontUsePowerUp

        public void dontUsePowerUp​(Player p)

        Parameters:
        p - the player which does not want to use the powerup

      • nextMicroAction

        public void nextMicroAction()
        Removes the current micro action and starts the next one, if present. Otherwise it completes the action

      • actionCompleted

        public void actionCompleted()
        Checks if the player is still active and has other actions to perform in the turn. If that is the case, it prepares its selectable actions.

      • login

        private Player login​(java.lang.String name)
              throws NameAlreadyTakenException,
                     GameFullException,
                     NameEmptyException
        Used if a match has still to start. Checks the validity of name and then creates a new player.
        Parameters:
        name - the chosen name for the player
        Returns:
        the reference to the new player created
        Throws:
        NameAlreadyTakenException - if the name is already taken by another player
        GameFullException - if the game is full and no other player can join
        NameEmptyException - if the name is empty

      • relogin

        private Player relogin​(java.lang.String name)
                throws NameNotFoundException,
                       AlreadyLoggedException,
                       GameFullException
        Used if a match is already in progress. Checks the validity of name and then retrieves the corresponding player.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of player which wants to relogin
        Returns:
        the reference to the corresponding player
        Throws:
        NameNotFoundException - if there is no player with such name in the match
        AlreadyLoggedException - if someone is already logged with this player
        GameFullException - if all the players are currently logged

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the reference to the player or null, if no player has that name

        Checks if the number of player is lower than the minimum allowed for the match to continue
        Returns:

        public void endGame()

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Checks if the match is ended
        Returns:
        true if the match is ended

      • howManyActivePlayers

        public int howManyActivePlayers()
        Returns the number of active players
        Returns:
        the number of players currently active

      • fakeAction

        public void fakeAction​(Player p)
        It brings back the state of match to a consistent one (if necessary) and fakes the action of a certain player. It acts like the player is acting, while he is actually inactive. Default choices are: not use tagback and spawn on the last drawn powerup.
        Parameters:
        p - the player of which fake the action

      • notifyConnectionUpdate

        public void notifyConnectionUpdate()
        Notifies all players of the state of connection of all the players
